about:
Experienced Back-end Developer adept in bringing forth expertise in design, installation, testing, and maintenance of software systems with AWS cloud service. Equipped with a diverse and promising skill-set and able to effectively self-manage during independent projects and collaborate in a team setting. I am also pursuing to expand my horizon in the niche world of cybersecurity.


Except the love for the tech sector, I am a hobby runner and enjoy doing it to the fullest. Furthermore, I am into travelling the world and experiencing different cultures and of course food.
